fastload.button.debug.tooltip: Should debugs be printed in the logs?
fastload.button.close_loading_screen_uns: Should fastload close the DownloadingTerrainScreen earlier, even if it's slightly unsafe?
fastload.button.pre_render_radius.toolti: Many many chunks in a radius should be prepared and built during pre-rendering? Limited by render distance
fastload.button.pregen_chunk_radius.tool: Many many chunks in a radius should be generated on the server until completed. Should inversely correlate with pre-render radius for optimal performance
fastload.button.chunk_try_limit.tooltip: How many times would the same chunk count be allowed to be returned in a row before bailing on pre-rendering
